roleset.name: put a leash on, possibly metaphorically
roleset.note: LEASH-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: feather (9.9), muzzle (22.4), Hand-corrected by Claire. Member of VNcls butter-9.9, tape-22.4. (from leash.01-v)

role.descr: dog catcher, agent putting a leash on
fence, hydrant -- thing leashed to, attached by leash

example.name: Poor poodle!
example.text: My favorite is [the time]-1 she leashed her beloved poodle to the bumper of her car, forgot it was there and drove into town *t*-1.
example.arg: to the bumper of her car

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Mr. Darling is putting out Nana for the night and he leashes her with a rope to her doghouse.
